## ReferenceMapKeyPolicy.defaultKeyPredicate() method

The static default key name validation predicate rejects keys that contain mustache templates or which start with the default conditional prefix `'?'`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static defaultKeyPredicate(key: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The key to test. |

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the key is valid, `false` otherwise.
